about_the_game:
Play as Castor, the unlikely hero confused as a wizard just because he was caught at the wrong time in his wizard robe pajamas. Venture across a magical kingdom to defeat the monstrous Moon Menace and rescue the Star Sovereign!

Inspired by classic games like One Finger Death Punch, Galaga, and Missile Command. Players are teleported into the thick of the action and must fend off waves of increasing monstrous difficulty in order to vanquish their foes and restore order to the land! Castor himself may not be anything special (or even be able to move at all), but just point Wanda in the right direction and she'll know what to do!

Features:
  • 70+ Levels with Unique Challenges
  • Custom Player Builds via the "Wild Magic" Buff System
  • Choose-Your-Own-Path Style Map for More Player Agency
  • Unlocks and Discoverable Content
  • Comical story full of misfit characters

name: Quick Cast Chaos Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Quick Cast Chaos is a fantasy, arcade-action, whimsical adventure through the land of Nightenglade. Explore the world as Castor the wizard (kinda) with Wanda your magical wand companion to defeat the villainous perils laid forth by the Moon Menace and his army of henchmen.
